name: Glacial Zenith
details:
OD and BoostThe Glacial Zenith, tip of the iceberg. The remaining 90% of the marvel goes unseen below the surface. What you see is another overdrive. What you don't see is a dynamic dirt box, capable of mild to wild. Go from true transparency to square wave fuzz
